[00:00.00]Bloom - Troye Sivan (特洛耶·希文)
[00:00.14]Lyricist：Troye Sivan Mellet/Brett McLaughlin/Oscar Holter/Peter Svensson
[00:00.28]Composer：Troye Sivan Mellet/Brett McLaughlin/Oscar Holter/Peter Svensson
[00:00.42]Producer：Oscar Holter
[00:00.56]Take a trip into my garden
[00:02.48]I've got so much to show ya
[00:04.53]The fountains and the waters
[00:06.60]Are begging just to know ya
[00:08.43]And it's true baby
[00:10.88]I've been saving this for you baby
[00:14.44]
[00:16.17]I guess it's something like a fun fair
[00:18.45]Put gas into the motor
[00:20.39]And boy I'll meet you right there
[00:22.39]We'll ride the rollercoaster
[00:23.68]
[00:24.38]'Cause it's true baby
[00:26.72]I've been saving this for you baby
[00:30.35]
[00:31.79]I need you to
[00:33.14]Tell me right before it goes down
[00:35.52]Promise me you'll
[00:37.03]Hold my hand if I get scared now
[00:39.42]Might tell you to
[00:40.97]Take a second baby slow it down
[00:43.40]You should know I you should know I
[00:47.58]Yeah I bloom I bloom just for you
[00:51.93]I bloom just for you
[00:54.98]
[00:55.77]Yeah I bloom I bloom just for you
[00:59.80]I bloom just for you
[01:03.27]Come on baby play me like a love song
[01:06.24]Every time it comes on
[01:08.47]I get this sweet desire
[01:10.82]
[01:11.69]Yeah I bloom I bloom just for you
[01:15.62]I bloom just for you
[01:18.74]
[01:20.24]Now it's the perfect season
[01:21.91]Yeah let's go for it this time
[01:23.84]We're dancing with the trees and
[01:26.18]I've waited my whole life
[01:27.84]'Cause it's true baby
[01:30.22]I've been saving this for you baby
[01:34.07]

[01:39.20]Promise me you'll

data.trans:
[ti:Bloom]
[ar:Troye Sivan]
[al:Bloom]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]//
[00:00.14]//
[00:00.28]//
[00:00.42]//
[00:00.56]到我的花园里转一转
[00:02.48]我有许多东西要给你看
[00:04.53]喷泉还有湖水
[00:06.60]苦苦哀求只为与你相识
[00:08.43]这份情发自真心 宝贝
[00:10.88]宝贝 我一直为你保留着这份爱
[00:14.44]
[00:16.17]我想 爱情就像游乐园般乐趣无穷
[00:18.45]把摩托车加满油
[00:20.39]男孩 我会在那里与你相遇
[00:22.39]我们会一起经历惊险与刺激
[00:23.68]
[00:24.38]因为 这份情发自真心 宝贝
[00:26.72]宝贝 我一直为你保留着这份爱
[00:30.35]
[00:31.79]我需要
[00:33.14]在这份情淡去前告诉自己
[00:35.52]答应我 若我此刻心生怯意
[00:37.03]你会牵起我的手
[00:39.42]我可能会告诉你
[00:40.97]稍等片刻 宝贝 慢下节奏来
[00:43.40]你应该了解我 你应该了解我
[00:47.58]我只为你盛放 为你盛放
[00:51.93]我只为你盛放
[00:54.98]
[00:55.77]我只为你盛放 为你盛放
[00:59.80]我只为你盛放
[01:03.27]来吧 宝贝 把我当情歌尽情弹奏吧
[01:06.24]每一次爱情走近
[01:08.47]我都会有种甜蜜的渴望
[01:10.82]
[01:11.69]我只为你盛放 为你盛放
[01:15.62]我只为你盛放
[01:18.74]
[01:20.24]现在这个季节完美无缺
[01:21.91]这一次让我们为爱出发
[01:23.84]我们在树荫下纵情起舞
[01:26.18]我倾尽一生为你等待
[01:27.84]因为 这份情发自真心 宝贝
[01:30.22]宝贝 我一直为你保留着这份爱
[01:34.07]
